articles.title: Why Services Are Central to Mastercard's Evolving Growth Story
articles.mainIdea: Why Services Are Central to Mastercard's Evolving Growth Story
articles.summary: Zacks: Why Services Are Central to Mastercard's Evolving Growth Story. Mastercard's growing Services business is emerging as a key growth engine, diversifying revenues, boosting resilience and strengthening its long-term strategy. Related tickers mentioned: MA, V.

articles.title: The Hot Economy Is Leaving Small Businesses Out in the Cold. Why This Holiday Season Is So Bleak.
articles.mainIdea: The Hot Economy Is Leaving Small Businesses Out in the Cold. Why This Holiday Season Is So Bleak.
articles.summary: Barrons.com: The Hot Economy Is Leaving Small Businesses Out in the Cold. Why This Holiday Season Is So Bleak.. Higher costs are hurting profit margins at many smaller retailers, even as more shoppers head to big-box stores. Related tickers mentioned: BAC, WMT.

articles.title: What to Expect From American Express' Q4 2025 Earnings Report
articles.mainIdea: What to Expect From American Express' Q4 2025 Earnings Report
articles.summary: Barchart: What to Expect From American Express' Q4 2025 Earnings Report. American Express is set to deliver its fourth-quarter results next month, and analysts project double-digit earnings growth.
